name: 10minutesCETA
tagline: A repository for all issues around the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
body:
### Welcome to 10minutesCETA - a late attempt to collect arguments 

> A social media experiment

Since the CETA documents [are available online](http://ec.europa.eu/trade/policy/in-focus/ceta/), everybody can take a look at them. Since time is precious, download the latest version and just invest 10 minutes, then post your findings [as issue to be discussed](https://github.com/daixtrose/10minutesCETA/issues) and on [on twitter](https://twitter.com/hashtag/CETA?src=hash).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
